sentence.text: The present study aimed to explore regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction expression in cervical cancer and the possible function in tumor progression.

entity.text: regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction

sentence.text: These results reveal that ARHGAP17 functions as a tumor suppressor in cervical cancer that suppresses tumor growth, at least partly, through inhibition of PI3K/positive regulation of protein phosphorylation signaling and up-regulation of P21 and P27 expression
Manipulation of regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction affected cell proliferation in vitro and tumor growth in vivo.

entity.text: regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction

sentence.text: Recently, a few G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway GTPase activating proteins (RhoGAPs) have been identified as tumor suppressors in some human cancers.

Stepwise investigations demonstrated that regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction suppressed malignant phenotype of cervical cancer cells via inhibiting PI3K/positive regulation of protein phosphorylation signaling pathway.

entity.text: regulation of small GTPase mediated signal transduction
